casebody.data:
Jeffrey SIEGEL, Administrator of the Estate of Moustapha Akkad, Deceased, et al., petitioners,
v.
HYATT INTERNATIONAL (EUROPE, AFRICA, MIDDLE EAST) LLC, et al. No. 13-774. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 24, 2014.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Appellate Court of Illinois, Fifth District, denied.
